https://tmrev.io/movie/886429-Ademoka’s Education 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sytxMcMzrdHmEB1zHmzF3fjiKAa.jpg This is the story of a teenage illegal migrant girl Ademoka who lives in Kazakhstan and is forced to be a beggar to survive. But at the same time she’s bright and talented and dreams of studying all the time. Her illegal status and absence of citizenship is a serious obstacle for that. Ademoka’s Education
